title: Sergio de las Heras
text:
Hola!
I am Sergio de las Heras, doctoral researcher in the Aalto Acoustics Lab in Helsinki, investigating room acoustics perception. Currently based in Santa Clara Valley, working as an Audio Technology intern for Apple.
I studied my bachelors in Telecommunication Technologies Engineering at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. After that, I moved to Germany to pursue my masters degree in Electrical Engineering, Information Technology and Computer Engineering at RWTH Achen University, working as a student assistant at the Institute of Hearing Technologies and Acoustics and interning for Bang&Olufsen in Copenhagen.
I also studied clarinet and became involved in universityâ€™s photography society where I discovered my passion for analog photography. I fill up the rest of my free time reading, cycling and travelling.
